ISSUE.TITLE: Social OAuth for Keycloak guide (auth-keycloak.mdx) needs an update
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation docker link is ## Link https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/apps/docs/content/guides/auth/social-login/auth-keycloak.mdx ## Describe the problem jboss/keycloak is no longer hosted on docker.io and is now on quay.io: https://lists.jboss.org/archives/list/keycloak-user@lists.jboss.org/thread/L5AXWA43HV2ZCPE3NNDA4KA7C6WF6BWH/ ## Describe the improvement Update the docker keycloak installation command. As per Keycloak's official document, it should be: `https://www.keycloak.org/getting-started/getting-started-docker` ## Additional context N.A.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: minor fixes for last-changed script (#27100) - Remove the cleanup function. (Too much potential for concurrently running workflows to stomp all over each other. This should run in a separately scheduled task that locks the table for cleanup.) - Exit with error code if updates error so problem will show up in Action notifications.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [fix supabase#26999] updation of social oauth for Keycloak guide
[fix supabase#26999] updation of social oauth for Keycloak guide (#27217) Co-authored-by: siddheshjungade007 <siddheshshaym.j@digitalapicraft.com>
